page.title: 08Television and the like.
page.content: Practically every home has a colour television,and they provide most of the entertainment people enjoy during an evening.Lots of people have video recorders as well, and they either record programmes or hire films to watch.Lots of children stay up late to watch and then they are tired in the school next morning. People have a daily paper each day.The papers come down from London by train. Two local papers are published each Thursday,they are called the "Cornish Guardian" and the"Cornwall Courier". The Guardian is bigger than the Courier,but the Courier is printed in clearer print than the Guardian.Both papers are eagerly looked for each week as local events and pictures are in them,and people like to see their name in print.There is also a local broadsheet printed and delivered free.
